formatDescription: ACE is a compressed archive format, originally developed by Marcel Lemke and later by e-merge GmbH. Some relevant software includes Ace (for DOS, OS/2 and Windows console, WinAce, Active ACE and ACE Compression. Version 2 of ACE introduced new compression schemes that are not supported by all ACE compression software.
provenanceCompoundName: Brigham Young University / Brigham Young University

internalSignatures.name: ACE Archive 2
internalSignatures.note: BOF; Offset: 7; Magic Bytes: '**ACE**' followed by byte sequence of 0x1414
